```{r}
library(multiDoE)
options(digits = 10)

facts <- list(1:2, 3:4)
units <- list(10, 5)
levels <- 3
etas <- list(1)
criteria <- c('A')
model <- 'quadratic'

msopt <- MSOpt(facts, units, levels, etas, criteria, model)
mssearch <- MSSearch(msopt, 1, "Restarts", 100)
```
